Keywords: Excalibur , Hellfire Club , Marauders , Pirate , Quiet Council , X-Men
Real Name: Katherine Pryde
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
KRAKOAN REVIVAL: For all characters with this trait, when a friendly standard character with the X-Men keyword and a lower point value would be KO'd by an opposing effect, you may instead choose to turn that character to it's starting click (this game) and place them adjacent to a friendly character that can use this trait. If you do, your opponent scores that character and generates a bystander on this card (of their choice) adjacent to any of their characters. Your opponent then scores 10 points for every bystander they generated this game via this trait, regardless of source.
RELEASE THE (TINY) DRAGON!: At the beginning of the game, generate a Lockheed bystander.
CONFISCATE AND DISRUPT ILLEGAL DRUG SHIPMENTS: Friendly characters with the Hellfire Club, Marauders, or Pirate keyword can use Steal Energy. // When Kate Pryde moves through an equipped opposing character, after resolutions roll a d6. 5-6: That character unequips their equipment.
CALL... ME... KATE! THE UH, RED PIRATE QUEEN: Phasing/Teleport, Sidestep, Stealth, Passenger: 3.

Comments
January 19, 2021
GL_Alex
Incredible dial, terrible sculpt. I'm probably going to replace it with an older Kitty one. There were so many super rares in the House of X set but this one was one of the best.
January 15, 2021
ripperdown
Just incredible!
January 14, 2021
tidge
This is a very good dial, but it looks as if it is trying to do "too much". With such a relatively low point cost (but *just* high enough to leverage Krakoan Revival on other figures) Kate Pryde is almost certainly going to carry (pun intended) her weight based only on the first click and her Lockheed BST. Click 3 looks nice, but if I saw clicks 3-6 with no context (and knew about the traited Steal Energy), I don't know that I would think "Kate Pryde". The traited gift of Steal Energy can make certain figures *very* good (ehem Excalibur).
January 12, 2021
hoojeebo
Interesting that the Pirate keyword now has 3 options for carrying 3+ characters: Kate (3), Leatherwing (4), and Waldo (4)!
January 12, 2021
pokolo
great figure with solid powers and keyword. we've seen how effective front loaded prob mixed with a tiny perplexing bystander can be thanks to CAAV Captain Marvel. while Kate may not be as intimidating or an offensive threat, she still brings a lot to your team. Passenger 3: with Sidestep and Phasing to slide around and get your team into position is great. and stealth & es/d to keep her protected from range. that 19 defense spike in the middle of the dial can help protect your team too if you manage to land on it. this is probably one of my favorite figures from this set and the best Kate dial to date. also, friendly pirates get Steal Energy??? HELLO SPIDER-VIKING!!!
